I have an RGH console and it IS NOT going online. This is the first time Ive ever heard of a retail game having to go online in order for someone to have to play it. It doesnt make sense because there are plenty of people that dont have XBOX Live and dont have their Xbox connected to internet at all. So how would someone who just bought the game at the store play it if they dont go online. I doubt they would make a game like that.
and any updates that are needed to play a game are ALWAYS supplied on the disc and automatically update the first time the game is loaded.
